data.name: NANBAKA: The Room, the Billiards, the Darts, and Me
data.short_description: Kenshirou visits Musashi in Building 4’s underground cell to ask about his past. Building 13 invites Musashi to come visit. Uno shows Musashi his new game room. All the inmates and guards who fought in the New Year’s Tournament gather in the game room. They enjoy each other’s company ...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
